content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a drop position at (40.5, -83.5), extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5) storing coal (225 units).
- Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) storing coal (181 units).
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) storing iron plates (82 units).

### Iron and Copper Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Inserter at position (1.5, 0.5) transferring items from the stone furnace to a wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (2.5, 0.5) with no inventory.
- Burner Inserter at position (3.5, 0.5) transferring items from the wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) to a transport belt.
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, 0.5) storing iron plates (1052 units) and copper plates (450 units).
- Burner Inserter at position (6.5, 0.5) transferring items from the wooden chest at position (7.5, -0.5) to the wooden chest at position (7.5, 0.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (8.5, 0.5) transferring items from the wooden chest at position (7.5, 0.5) to the stone furnace at position (10.0, 0.0).
- Stone Furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Inserter at position (11.5, 0.5) transferring items from the stone furnace at position (10.0, 0.0) to a wooden chest at position (12.5, 0.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (12.5, 0.5) storing copper plates (744 units).

### Transport Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting the wooden chest at position (2.5, 0.5) to the burner inserter at position (6.5, 0.5).
- Belt from position (40.5, -83.5) to (38.5, -83.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items
- Ensure that the target chest is not full or blocked before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when Refueling Inserters
- Ensure that inserters have sufficient fuel to operate. Regularly check and refuel inserters at positions (1.5, 0.5), (3.5, 0.5), (6.5, 0.5), (8.5, 0.5), and (11.5, 0.5).

### Errors when Managing Source Items for Inserters
- Verify that there is a nearby entity that can accept the items being managed by the inserter. Ensure proper alignment and connectivity between inserters and their target entities.

### Errors when Crafting Wooden Chests
- Ensure that all necessary materials are available in the inventory before attempting to craft wooden chests.
